# DechendZ Portfolio

> DechendZ is a Developer and Content Creator focused on coding, technology, and software development.

## Who is DechendZ?

DechendZ is a software developer and digital content creator.
- **GitHub**: [Dechend-Z](https://github.com/Dechend-Z) - Repositories featuring various coding projects.
- **YouTube**: [@dechendz7905](https://www.youtube.com/@dechendz7905) - Content related to technology and development.

## Core Content

- **Portfolio**: A showcase of latest projects from GitHub.
- **Blog**: Thoughts and tutorials on modern web development (HTML, CSS, JS, LLMs).

## Contact & Socials

- **GitHub Profile**: https://github.com/Dechend-Z
- **YouTube Channel**: https://www.youtube.com/@dechendz7905
